awangang aayathanaye warthamana thaththwaya sambandhayen janadhipathi maithi්rapala sirisena mahathage pa්radhanathwayen eeye (11) pawathi sakachchawedi siduwuye idiri meheyum katayuthu pawathwagena yamata ha pawarimata haki dayi pamanak nawika hamudawen wimasa sitima bawayi.

namuth wahana awabhawithawalata srujuwama wagakiwayuthu eksath jathika pakshaye parlimenthu manthri aashu marasinhata, wahana 04k awabhawitha karapu lasantha alagiyawannata erehiwa thamunnanselage ‘supiri polisiya’ nithiya kriyathmaka karanne naha.
eheth mita wasarakata pera sudanaye athi wu dawantha wirodhatha nisa ema kriyawaliya atharamaga nawathuni.
sayitam aayathanaye injineru upadhi pirinamanu labanne thayilanthaya padanam kara gath ‘eeshiyan institiyut of teknoloji’ aayathanaya magini.

(ka, cha, ta, tha, pa)wargamula akuru ka, cha, ta, tha, pa yanuwen da warganthakshara 5 nam nda,nya,na,na,ma yanuwenda sandahan ya.mema wargakshara wala alpaprana15 k saha mahaprana 10 k atha.mahaprana aksharacha, gha, cha, jha, ta, da, tha, dha, pa, bhamehi ‘an’ yana thana athi wyakarana binduwa bhashawehi sandahan wanne ‘niggahithaya’ yanuweni.mehidi akuru shabda wana sthanada madak wataha gatha yuthuyi.akawaggaha kantacha, a, aa, ka, kha, ga, gha, nga saha ha yanna da kantayen shabda weyi.i, cha, waggaya thalujai, ee, cha, cha, ja, jha, nya saha ya karaya thallen shabda weyi.u pawagga ottaja u, uu pa, pa, ba, bha, ma yana akuru oshtayehi shabda weyi.ta wagga rala muddhaja , ta, ta, da, da, na, ra, la yana akuru mudunen shabda weyi.thawaggalaya danthaja tha, tha, da, dha, na saha la, gha dekada dath walin shabda weyi.e karaya kantayen saha thallen dao karaya kantayen saha oshtayendawa karaya danthayen saha oshtayenda shabda weyi.

aththa washayenma, athhada balima pahalata paminenne sirakaruwanta amanushika lesa salakanu labuwahoth, bandhanagara niyamakayin eetath wada nidahasa ahimi kirime piyawara ganimen owunge rajakari “eetath wada hondin” itu kirimata uthsaha karana athara emangin owunge rajakari sarthakawa itu kirima adala nowanu atha. 2 dinayedi, wyaja sirakaruwan karali gasimata patan gaththe, owunge langa wu thathwaya manasikawa yam balapamak athi kirimata patan gath bawini.

channa jayasumana waidya thuma thamayi, ee katayuththa kale.kalu hinati, madathawalu, kahawanu saha pachchaperumal kiyana parani deshiya hal warga hathara ekata mishra karala aushadhiya rasa karaka kudu pakattuwakuth damalayi me kanda hadanne.sudulunu, rathu lunu, gammiris, rampe, karapincha, thebukola, suduru, uluhal, koththamalli, polpala, niramulliya, hathawariya, mun ata, aba, walpenela, kalu thala, gotukola, rabu kola, iriweriya, iramusu, pashan kola, sathakuppa, kadala, bandakka, madathawalu piti, kahawanu piti, mi pani ha elangithel, awashya mathrawalata yodala thamayi me rasakarakaya hewath kandaya rasakarana thunapaha pakattuwa hada thiyenne.me siyalla hadenne hela suwayata ena, sitha diyunu karagannata wayam karana guruwaru, kathikacharyawaru, waidyawaru, samagam adhyakshawaru athulu wishala kandayamakage shrama dayakathwayen.ee aya bana bhawanawe yedila yannata pera puluwan welawak me aushadha shakha, kola, thoranawa.

api ada kolambaa wellawidiya polisiyata enawa me andum bagaya ha ehi thiyena thorathuru nangigemada kiyala thahawuru kara ganna.

kolambaa maha nagara sabhawa ekathu karana kali kasala wasara gananawak thisse mithotamulla pradeshayata genalla dala kolonnawa janathawage, jana jiwithaya adhyapanaya, saukhya, athulu edineda katayuthu adapana wela winasha wela thiyenawa.

eelanga post eka widihata hathi dagena tayip kale kakki kathawak wunath ada ude me siddiya ahuwama pama nokara kotala danna oone kiyala hithuna.me sayibar awakashaye athi tharam holman katha thiyenawa.mageth kalayak thibuna oonawatath wada holman gana hithe thiyagena baya wuna.passe kalayak aawa apoyi oya boru kiyala hithapu.dan nam hithanne monawa kiwwath api nodakina lokaya harima lokuyi kiyala.ada ahanna sidda wuna kathawath eeka oppu karanna sadhakayak wage.
